code: import EventCreationForm from'./components/EventCreationForm';import EventListing from'./components/EventListing';import React,{useState}from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route}from'react-router-dom';import'./App.css';import Nav from'./components/Nav';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[events,setEvents]=useState([]);const addEvent=newEvent=>{setEvents([...events,newEvent]);};const deleteEvent=index=>{const updateEvents=[...events];updateEvents.splice(index,1);setEvents(updateEvents);};const removeAllEvent=()=>{setEvents([]);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Router,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/create",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EventCreationForm,{addEvent:addEvent})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EventListing,{events:events,onDelete:deleteEvent,onRemoveAll:removeAllEvent})})]})]});};export default App;
